errmodels.src:
#ShortName:MWD rev 4, hand made
#Description: Test File created for validation with pre-ipm calcs
#Name    Vector    Tie-On    Unit    Value    Formula
w_1    n    n    -    1    1
w_2    n    n    -    1    w_1
DRFR    e    r    m    0.35    w_1
DSFS    e    s    m    0.00056    tmd
DSTG    e    g    1/m    0.00000025    tmd*tvd
ABXY-TI1S    e       s    m/s2    0.004    0
ABXY-TI1S    i    s    m/s2    0.004    -cos(inc)/gtot
ABXY-TI1S    a    s    m/s2    0.004    tan(dip)*cos(inc)*sin(azm)/gtot
ABXY-TI2S    a    s    m/s2    0.004    (tan(90-inc)-tan(dip)*cos(azm))/gtot
ABXY-TI2S    as    s    m/s2    0.004    0
ABXY-TI2S    es    s    m/s2    0.004    (-1/2*sin(azt)*(nextmd-prevmd)/gtot)
ABXY-TI2S    is    s    m/s2    0.004    (1/2*cos(azt)*(nextmd-prevmd)/gtot)
ABZ    e    s    m/s2    0.004    0
ABZ    i    s    m/s2    0.004    -sin(inc)/gtot
ABZ    a    s    m/s2    0.004    tan(dip)*sin(inc)*sin(azm)/gtot
ASXY-TI1S    e    s    -    0.0005    0
ASXY-TI1S    i    s    -    0.0005    sin(inc)*cos(inc)/sqrt(2)
ASXY-TI1S    a    s    -    0.0005    (-tan(dip)*sin(inc)*cos(inc)*sin(azm))/sqrt(2)
ASXY-TI2S    e    s    -    0.0005    0
ASXY-TI2S    i    s    -    0.0005    sin(inc)*cos(inc)/2
ASXY-TI2S    a    s    -    0.0005    (-tan(dip)*sin(inc)*cos(inc)*sin(azm))/2
ASXY-TI3S    e    s    -    0.0005    0
ASXY-TI3S    a    s    -    0.0005    (tan(dip)*sin(inc)*cos(azm)-cos(inc))/2
ASZ    e    s    -    0.0005    0
ASZ    i    s    -    0.0005    -sin(inc)*cos(inc)
ASZ    a    s    -    0.0005    tan(dip)*sin(inc)*cos(inc)*sin(azm)
MBXY-TI1S    a    s    nT    70    -cos(inc)*sin(azm)/(mtot*cos(dip))
MBXY-TI2S    a    s    nT    70    cos(azm)/(mtot*cos(dip))
MBZ    a    s    nT    70    -sin(inc)*sin(azm)/(mtot*cos(dip))
MSXY-TI1S    a    s    -    0.0016    sin(inc)*sin(azm)*(tan(dip)*cos(inc)+sin(inc)*cos(azm))/sqrt(2)
MSXY-TI2S    a    s    -    0.0016    sin(azm)*(tan(dip)*sin(inc)*cos(inc)-cos(inc)*cos(inc)*cos(azm)-cos(azm))/2
MSXY-TI3S    a    s    -    0.0016    (cos(inc)*cos(azm)*cos(azm)-cos(inc)*sin(azm)*sin(azm)-tan(dip)*sin(inc)*cos(azm))/2
MSZ    a    s    -    0.0016    -(sin(inc)*cos(azm)+tan(dip)*cos(inc))*sin(inc)*sin(azm)
DECG    a    g    d    0.36    w_2
DECR    a       r       d       0.1     1
DBHG    a    g    deg.nT    5000    w_2/(mtot*cos(dip))
DBHR    a       r       deg.nT  3000    1/(mtot*cos(dip))
AMIL    a       s       nT      220     sin(inc)*sin(azm)/(mtot*cos(dip))
SAG    i    s    d    0.2    sin(inc)
XYM1r4    i    s    d    0.1    abs(sin(inc))
XYM2r4    a    s    d    0.1    -1
XYM3r4  e       s       d       0.1     0
XYM3r4    es    s    d    0.1    (1/2*(nextmd-prevmd))
XYM3r4    i    s    d    0.1    abs(cos(inc))*cos(azt)
XYM3r4  is      s       d       0       0
XYM3r4    a    s    d    0.1    -(abs(cos(inc))*sin(azt))/sin(inc)
XYM3r4  as      s       d       0       0
XYM4r4    i    s    d    0.1    abs(cos(inc))*sin(azt)
XYM4r4    is    s       d    0.1    (1/2*(nextmd-prevmd))
XYM4r4    a    s    d    0.1    abs(cos(inc))*cos(azt)/sin(inc)
XYM4r4    as    s    d    0.1    0
